title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Formative Feedback for Online and Hybrid Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: College-Level Foundational Mathematics Knowledge and Application Experience in Specialized Fields (Medical/Legal/Technical)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can execute feedback-seeking strategies for mathematical problem-solving in online/hybrid settings with over 80% participation.
Learners can improve the quality of project deliverables by 30% or more by incorporating formative feedback from peers and tutors during PBL tasks.
Learners can provide emotional support (e.g., empathetic feedback, encouraging messages) to peers' learning processes at least twice following responsive teaching principles.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
